scripts.build: tsc && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node -e "import { promises as fs } from 'fs';import { join } from 'path';const makeExecutable=async(dir)=>{const entries=await fs.readdir(dir,{withFileTypes:true});for(const entry of entries){const fullPath=join(dir,entry.name);if(entry.isDirectory())await makeExecutable(fullPath);else if(entry.name.endsWith('.js'))await fs.chmod(fullPath,'755');}};makeExecutable('build');"
